title: Extended by Popular Demand: Charming Heritage Palace Escape Just 30 Minutes from London with Daily Breakfast
description:
Travel back to the grandeur of English heritage with a royal-worthy stay at Danesfield House Hotel and Spa. Located 30 minutes from London, this quintessential country house - built in 1901 as a family home - now stands within 65 acres of manicured gardens and overlooks the glorious River Thames and Chiltern Hills. Onsite eatery The Restaurant means you won't need to travel far to discover the region's culinary cream of the crop, from seasonal dishes to English classics. Tuck into afternoon tea and scones within the hotel's inviting ambience and relax with your favourite alcoholic concoction in hand within The Cocktail Bar.

Rejuvenate as you please at Spa Illuminata Danesfield House, featuring luxurious face and body treatments, a heated indoor pool for soaking and a jacuzzi and sauna. When adventure calls, the historic towns of Marlow and Henley-on-Thames are just a short drive away, offering charming boutiques and riverside dining.
offer_address: Henley Road, Marlow-On-Thames, SL7 2EY, Buckinghamshire, United Kingdom
